01764.mean:
contribution in cash or kind from kinsmen or maternal uncles during funerals.

मर्दा- पर्दा वंशज, नातागाेता, मामा-मावली बाट काज किरियामा सघाइने नगद, अन्न वा जिन्सी सहयाेग ।

01765.mean:
a kind of insect that eats vegetables.

लाई (किराे) ।

01766.mean:
a kind of thorny plant.

अडेरी; काँडा हुने पाेथ्रा विशेष ।

01770.mean:
thick juice of raw sugar; syrup; treacle.

खुदाे ।

01772.mean:
he or she (applied to human beings only).

ऊ; त्याे; उहाँ (मान्छे मात्र) ।

01775.mean:
to make sb suffer; to torture sb.

दुःख दिनु ।

01777.mean:
a kind of tree whose leaves are eaten as curry.

टाँकी ।

01778.mean:
1. to be harassed. 2. to be tamed; to be trained/ improved. 3. to be cheated. 4. to bend down ( and deform) sth.

१. सताइनु । २. तह लाग्नु; सुध्रिनु । ३. ठगिनु । ४. कुनै वस्तु बङ्ग्याएर कुप्र्याउनु ।

01780.mean:
to be harassed; to be tamed; to be brought under control or discipline.

सताइनु; तह लाग्नु ।

01781.mean:
a kind of umbrella made of interlaced bamboo strips and leaves.

घुम; स्याखु ।

01782.mean:
marble ball; round piece of marble.

काँच वा सङ्गमर्मरकाे गाेली ।

01784.mean:
1. authority; land under one’s ownership. 2. juice.

१. खुवा; हकभाेग भित्रकाे जग्गा । २. रस ।

01785.mean:
1. [Sikkim] magistrate; district magistrate. 2. Kazi; a landlord with magisterial power.

१. [सिक्किम] मजिस्ट्रेट; जिल्लापाल । २. काजी; ठेकेदार ।

01786.mean:
a kind of pilea weed. Elatostemma.

गग्लेटाे; गाैलेताे; सिम, खाेल्साखाल्सिमा हुने एक प्रकारकाे झार ।

01788.mean:
1. to hoot or cry ( of an owl, cuckoo etc). 2. to cause sb to wear a shawl or a hat; to cover sb with sth; to make someone put on/ wrap up sth.

१. लाटाेकाेसेराे कराउनु; काेइली बास्नु । २. ओढाउनु; ढाक्नु ।

01790.mean:
custom or practice of contributing in cash or kind during funerals.

अन्त्येष्टि क्रियामा धन वा अरू थाेक दिएर सघाउने रीत वा चलन ।

01791.mean:
to wear (cap, shawl, umbrella, etc); to cover or wrap up with sth.

ओढ्नु ।

01793.mean:
black fern shoot; a kind of edible fern. Dryopteris cochleata.

कालाे निगुराे; कालाे निहुराे ।

01794.mean:
1. dacoity; theft; robbery. 2. marriage by kidnapping or elopement.

१. चाेरी; डकैती । २. चाेरी विवाह ।

01795.mean:
a small kind of bird looking like sparrow.

काेटेराे (चराे); बगेडी ।

01799.mean:
1. to be felt sth eg: to fear, to afraid of. 2. ( of breeze, wind) to blow.

१. केहि भएकाे जस्ताे हुनु, जस्तै - डर लाग्नु । २. हावा/ वतास लाग्नु/ चल्नु ।

01801.mean:
1. yam. 2. [Phedape] potato; underground seed/ fruit/ yam.

१. तरूल । २. [फेदापे] आलु; जमिन भित्र फल्ने फल ।

01802.mean:
1. to have or suffer from burning or itching sensations on the skin from the sap exuding from certain trees. 2. to have an affect of evil spirits. 3. to have food poisoning.

१. चाेपले चिलाउनु; चाेपले पाेल्नु । २. लागाे लाग्नु; देवीदेवताकाे दाेष लाग्नु । ३. नराम्राे खानाले बिसाउनु ।

01808.mean:
a kind of flower ( eg: Mikjiri) which is offered to the dead body.

मुर्दामाथि चढाइने एक प्रकारकाे फुल, जस्तै:- मिक्जिरि फुल ।

01809.mean:
1. the nether world; the lower world; the world of dead spirits. 2. hell; the infernal region/ inferno.

१. पाताल; प्रेतात्मा वा मृतात्मा बास गर्ने ठाँउ वा लाेक । २. नर्क ।

01810.mean:
1. the house of the dead (souls); a house made during three-night ceremony of Tongsing to separate the souls of the dead from the living ones. 2. a temporary roofed house to offer cooked foods during the purification ceremony in a family.

१. मृतात्माकाे घर; तीनराते तङ्सिङ् पूजा गर्दा जीवितहरुवाट मृतककाे आत्मा छुट्याउने अनुष्ठान गर्दा बनाइने मृतात्माकाे घर । २. परिवारमा भएकाे मृत्युपश्चात शुद्ध्याँइकाे कार्य गर्दा घरबाहिर पिण्ड चढाउनकाे लागी बनाइएकाे अस्थायी छाप्राकाे घर ।

01815.mean:
1. an earthen pot for partching maize, soyabeans, etc. 2. (cooking ) pan; cauldron; iron pot for frying etc.

१. हाँडी । २. कराही ।

01818.mean:
1. to tie; to bind; to tether (cattle). 2. [Phedape] to take/ serve or pour out of the pot and eat.

१. बाँध्नु । २. [फेदापे] भाँडाेबाट खानेकुरा झिकेर, पस्केर, खन्याएर वा उतारेर खानु ।

01819.mean:
a peg partly buried in the ground to tie or tether the cattle with a rope.

किलाे (गाईवस्तु बाँध्ने) ।

01821.mean:
to quarrel over sth; to dispute with (or against) a person on (or about) a subject.

कुनै चीज वा वस्तुकाे लागि बाझ्नु; झगडा गर्नु वा खाेसाखाेस गर्नु ।

01823.mean:
to quarrel oneself; to quarrel each other.

बाझ्नु; एकआपसमा बाझ्नु ।

01826.mean:
a bastard; an illegitimate child; a foundling; a child whose father is not declared or ascertained.

बतासे (सन्तान); बाबुकाे टुङ्गाे नलागेकाे बच्चा; अवैध सन्तान ।

01828.mean:
a kind of small Nepali water pot.

लाेहाेटा ।

01830.mean:
a wedding preformed with little or light ceremonies at bride’s house.

कुम्ले विवाह; साटसुट गरिने विवाह; लिम्बूजातिमा केटिकाे घरमा गएर छाेटाे चालाले गरिने विवाह ।

01832.mean:
a kind of tree. Oroxylum indicum.

टाेटाेला; एक प्रकारकाे काेसे फुलकाे रूख ।

01835.mean:
a kind of thorny plant. Angiopteris evecta.

गाईखुरे काँडा; एक प्रकारकाे पाेथ्रा ।

01836.mean:
a kind of plant whose roots are used to make yeast for brewing. Polygala arillata.

मर्चा बनाउन जरा प्रयाेग गरिने एक प्रकारकाे बाेट ।

01837.mean:
1. the handle of a bamboo pellet-bow or sling. 2. cutch or catechu tree. Acacia catechu.

१. बाँसकाे धनुष आकारकाे गुलेलीकाे मुठ । २. खयर ।

01842.mean:
(adj.) obstinate. (n.) a kind of fish.

(वि.) ढिट; अटेरी । (ना.) हिलेमाछा ।

01843.mean:
1. man inspired by diety; possessed man. 2. collection.

१. देवता चढेकाे मान्छे । २. सङ्कलन/ सङ्ग्रह ।

01844.mean:
name of an ancient army of the Kirats.

प्राचीनकालीन एक किराँती सेनाकाे नाम ।

01846.mean:
wooden trough.

डुँड; वस्तुभाउलाई आहारा खुवाउने काठकाे भाँडाे ।

01849.mean:
1. oarsman; boatman; sailor. 2. navigator.

१. बाेटे; डुङ्गा खियाउने मानिस । २. नाविक ।

01850.mean:
a kind of tree with large leaves. Macaranga denticulata; Mallotus.

मलाताेकाे रूख ।

01851.mean:
1. to comb (one’s own hair). 2. to comb each other’s hair.

१. काेर्नु (कपाल, केश) । २. एकअर्काकाे कपाल काेर्नु ।

01852.mean:
1. to comb; scrape. 2. to cover; to cover completely (as when hugging sb); to reach around.

१. कपाल काेर्नु । २. पूरे ढाक्नु (अँगालाे मारे झै); खाम्नु ।

01853.mean:
a kind of small snail.

सानाेखाले शङ्खे कीरा ।

01854.mean:
1. to obtain; to find; to get. 2. aux verb denoting , ‘can’, ‘be’, ‘able’, ‘ to find time’, ‘to do sth’ with the help of another verb (eg: pe:kma kho:ma = can go, be able to go, etc).

१. पाउनु; भेट्टाउनु (हराएकाे वा खाेजेकाे चिज); फेला पार्नु । २. सहायक क्रिया ‘पाउनु’ वा ‘सक्नु’ भन्ने अर्थ बुझाउने क्रियापद (जस्तै:- पेःक्मा खाेमा = जान पाउनु; जान सक्नु ) ।

01856.mean:
to meanrave; to inscribe; to carve.

कुँद्नु; खाेप्नु ।

01857.mean:
1. pupa. 2. a kind of insect living underground and supposed as unlucky.

१. पुतलीकाे पूर्वरूप; प्युपा । २. कुकुल्ढुक कीरा; लाेदरे किरा ।
